00072 std::vector<cv::Point>& PlayerData::getPlayerImpactPtsAllRallies()
00073 {
00074     // we first check if we have already calculated impact points, if so return,
00075     // else calculate it now
00076     if(m_playerImpactPtsAllRallies.size() != 0)
00077     {
00078         return m_playerImpactPtsAllRallies;
00079     }
00080     else
00081     {
00082         //calculatePlayerImpactPtsFromIndices();
00083 
00084         m_twoDStatsGenerator->calculatePlayerImpactPtsFromIndices(m_playerBallPts,m_playerDeepestPtIndices,
00085                                                                   m_playerImpactPtsAllRallies);
00086         return m_playerImpactPtsAllRallies;
00087     }
00088 }

00095 // this is so that if later someone chose not to show

00099 float PlayerData::getPercentageDistributionData(int _width, int _height, WHICH_QUADRANT _whichQuadrant)
00100 {
00101 
00102     float tempPercentage = 0.0;
00103 
00104     // call calculate if rally points empty
00105 
00106     if(m_playerImpactPtsAllRallies.size() == 0)
00107     {
00108 
00109         //calculatePlayerImpactPtsFromIndices();
00110 
00111         m_twoDStatsGenerator->calculatePlayerImpactPtsFromIndices(m_playerBallPts,m_playerDeepestPtIndices,
00112                                                                   m_playerImpactPtsAllRallies);
00113     }
00114 
00115     switch(_whichQuadrant)
00116     {
00117         case BOTTOM_LEFT:
00118         {
00119             m_twoDStatsGenerator->generatePercentageDistribution(_width,_height,m_playerImpactPtsAllRallies,BOTTOM_LEFT,
00120                                                                  m_playerImpactPtsBottomLeft,m_bottomLeftPercentage);
00121             tempPercentage = m_bottomLeftPercentage;
00122             break;
00123         }
00124         case TOP_LEFT:
00125         {
00126             m_twoDStatsGenerator->generatePercentageDistribution(_width,_height,m_playerImpactPtsAllRallies,TOP_LEFT,
00127                                                                 m_playerImpactPtsTopLeft,m_topLeftPercentage);
00128             tempPercentage = m_topLeftPercentage;
00129             break;
00130         }
00131         case TOP_RIGHT:
00132         {
00133             m_twoDStatsGenerator->generatePercentageDistribution(_width,_height,m_playerImpactPtsAllRallies,TOP_RIGHT,
00134                                                                 m_playerImpactPtsTopRight,m_topRightPercentage);
00135             tempPercentage = m_topRightPercentage;
00136             break;
00137         }
00138         case BOTTOM_RIGHT:
00139         {
00140             m_twoDStatsGenerator->generatePercentageDistribution(_width,_height,m_playerImpactPtsAllRallies,BOTTOM_RIGHT,
00141                                                                 m_playerImpactPtsBottomRight,m_bottomRightPercentage);
00142             tempPercentage = m_bottomRightPercentage;
00143             break;
00144         }
00145         case ALL:
00146         {
00147             // in case data is needed for all quads, caller has to call this function 4 times
00148             // and save the returning floats separately
00149             break;
00150         }
00151     }
00152 
00153     return tempPercentage;
00154 }

00156 std::vector<cv::Point>& PlayerData::getQuadSpecificPoints(WHICH_QUADRANT _whichQuad)
00157 {
00158 
00159     if(_whichQuad == BOTTOM_LEFT)
00160     {
00161         return m_playerImpactPtsBottomLeft;
00162     }
00163     else if(_whichQuad == TOP_LEFT)
00164     {
00165         return m_playerImpactPtsTopLeft;
00166     }
00167     else if(_whichQuad == TOP_RIGHT)
00168     {
00169         return m_playerImpactPtsTopRight;
00170     }
00171     else if(_whichQuad == BOTTOM_RIGHT)
00172     {
00173         return m_playerImpactPtsBottomRight;
00174     }
00175 }

00177 std::vector<cv::Point3f>& PlayerData::getBarGraphVertices(cv::Point _inputTopXY, int _width, int _height, int _gridResolution)
00178 {
00179 
00180     if(m_barGraphVertices.size() != 0)
00181     {
00182         return m_barGraphVertices;
00183     }
00184 
00185     else
00186     {
00187         // call calculate if rally points empty
00188         if(m_playerImpactPtsAllRallies.size() == 0)
00189         {
00190 
00191             //calculatePlayerImpactPtsFromIndices();
00192 
00193             m_twoDStatsGenerator->calculatePlayerImpactPtsFromIndices(m_playerBallPts,m_playerDeepestPtIndices,
00194                                                                       m_playerImpactPtsAllRallies);
00195         }
00196 
00197         m_threeDStatsGenerator->generatePitchDensityGraphData(_inputTopXY,_width,_height,_gridResolution,m_playerImpactPtsAllRallies,
00198                                                               m_barGraphVertices);
00199 
00200         return m_barGraphVertices;
00201     }
00202 }

00210     }

00215                                                                       m_playerInterpolatedBallPts,m_speedData);
00216

00218 
00219         return m_playerInterpolatedBallPts;
00220     }

00224 std::vector<float>& PlayerData::getPlayerSpeedData(float _inputDistanceFrmKinectToPlayArea)
00225 {
00226     // this will be available only when interpolatedballpts function is called
00227     // as that is where speed data is filled
00228 
00229     //so if interpolatedballpts vec is empty, call the getinterpballpts function
00230     // and then check if speed data not empty and then return the speeddata vec
00231     if(m_playerInterpolatedBallPts.size() == 0)
00232     {
00233         m_threeDStatsGenerator->generateInterpolatedDataForAllRallies(m_playerBallPts,m_playerDeepestPtIndices,
00234                                                                       _inputDistanceFrmKinectToPlayArea,
00235                                                                       m_playerInterpolatedBallPts,m_speedData);
00236     }
00237     //if(m_speedData.size() != 0)
00238     {
00239         return m_speedData;
00240     }
00241 }

00256 
00257 std::vector<float>& PlayerData::getRevolutionsPerMinute(float _inputDiameterInMeters,
00258                                                         float _inputDistanceFrmKinectToPlayArea)
00259 {
00260 
00261     // this make sures speed data is generated first
00262     // which would then feed into rpm calculations
00263     if(m_playerInterpolatedBallPts.size() == 0)
00264     {
00265         m_threeDStatsGenerator->generateInterpolatedDataForAllRallies(m_playerBallPts,m_playerDeepestPtIndices,
00266                                                                       _inputDistanceFrmKinectToPlayArea,
00267                                                                       m_playerInterpolatedBallPts,m_speedData);
00268     }
00269 
00270     if(m_rpmData.size() != 0)
00271     {
00272        return m_rpmData;
00273     }
00274 
00275     else
00276     {
00277         for(int i=0;i<m_speedData.size();i++)
00278         {
00279             // this produces revolutions per minute
00280             // input diameter and speed data are in meters scale
00281             float tempRPM = (m_speedData[i] * 60)/(3.14 * _inputDiameterInMeters);
00282             std::cout<<"repm calculated:"<<tempRPM<<"\n";
00283             m_rpmData.push_back(tempRPM);
00284         }
00285 
00286         return m_rpmData;
00287     }
00288 
00289 }
